what: Extracts and Visualizes Food Recall Data
title: Extracts and Visualizes Food Recall Data
text: use package, necessary register API key openFDA website. free API key requires email address. receive immediately upon request. Upon issues API key , please contact openFDA office. sure share API key anyone! use foodRecall package, simply need enter API key get_fda function. also need define number requests like request. limit 1000 enter number larger 1000, error occur. (Working adding limitation package ). get_fda function currently (April 15, 2023) set recalls FDA considered “Ongoing”. Moving forward, make selection flexible user filter based inputs. also working visualizing data location basis. working adding additional capabilities, scale product recall interactive capabilities. best change column headers generated get_fda function. example output type map generated. Rplot.pdf two functions recommend using time! get_usda_fsis get_cdc functions currently work (Logan least); however, dependent Selenium. recommended use functions currently. likely going connect CDC API get_cdc function. exploring avenues incorporating USDA-FSIS recall data (haven’t found API data yet). found link XML data CDC current data well history approximately 2021. data contain specific data current version (April 15, 2023) get_usda_fsis can likely achieve. Check back additional updates plan add soon!
code: library(devtools)  # Will change the repository name once we finalize package name (foodRecall) devtools::install.github("loganjohnson0/USDA.EPA.Package")  library(foodRecall) df <- foodRecall::get_fda(api_key = "YOUR API KEY", limit = "NUMBER OF RECALL EVENTS") foodRecall::map_recall(data = df)
